name: Final Fantasy Type-0
description:
Final Fantasy Type-0 is a RPG game developed by Square Enix. It was originally released in 2011. It was published by Square Enix. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Final Fantasy Type-0 is available on PSP.
It was produced by Yoshinori Kitase. It was directed by Hajime Tabata. Takeharu Ishimoto scored the game.
